parameters: The food on the table is rotten.
There are seasonings and chopsticks near the pot.
There's a family portrait in the wine jar.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Why is a photo in the jar?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I have to find a way to get it out.
There's a family portrait in the wine jar.
There's a family portrait in the wine jar.
Take out the photo from the jar?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]One person is missing in the family portrait...
The pot is giving out a strong musty smell, it contains moldy congee.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There is congee in all three bowls, maybe the rat poison was in the congee.
The pot is giving out a strong musty smell, it contains moldy congee.
The food on the table is rotten, and there is a piece of paper next to it.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Seems to have been torn from a book of poetry...
The food on the table is rotten with a piece of paper next to it.
The food on the table is rotten with a piece of paper next to it.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]What a coincidence, we ran into each other twice tonight.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Officer, what are you doing here?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, maybe you're right, there might be hidden clues in the Tian family's case.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Nothing yet, but I'll try hard to search the house.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Also, this is a crime scene.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It'll be hard for me to explain to my superior if you leave any traces, so...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I'll go somewhere else, I'll leave you alone.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Officer, you seem to be quite concerned about the case.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I was a bit harsh on you, hope you don’t take it seriously.
